rules.name: All_values_entered_0
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 14 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND ((6 AND 5 AND 13) OR (7 AND 9 AND 12) OR 8) AND (((5 OR 7) AND 10) OR (8 AND 11))
rules.label: All values entered

decisions.name: User_select_Timekeeper_Activity_and_Task_Code

formulas.name: FeeAndExpenseErrorMessage
formulas.expression: IF( {!IE_IF_Line_Item_Type} == {!Expense_choice}, 'Discount cannot be greater than invoice Expense Total' , 'Discount cannot be greater than invoice Fee Total')

recordLookups.description: Go back and get this each time in case user pauses between Line Items entries. We cannot use a Number based on a counter within this Flow because the user may leave and come back to the processes -- resulting in potential duplicate line item numbers.
